Title: Bananas in Pyjamas
Actors: Duncan Wass, Emma de Vries, Jeremy Scrivener, Karina Kelly, Ken Radley, Mal Heap, Mary-Anne Henshaw, Nicholas Opolski, Sandie Lillingston, Shane McNamara, Taylor Owyns
Plot: The many adventures of full-size bananas, B1 and B2. They live on Cuddles Avenue which is also home to three Teddies (Amy, Lulu and Morgan) and a sneaky Rat-in-a-Hat.
